title: Grandma's Bakewell tart
ingredients: ['For the shortcrust pastry', '225g plain flour', '125g butter, chilled and cubed', '1 pinch salt', 'cold water, as needed', 'For the filling', '100g butter, at room temperature', '100g caster sugar', '100g self raising flour', '2 eggs', '50g ground almonds', '1/4 teaspoon almond extract', '2 tablespoons milk', '3 tablespoons raspberry jam', 'flaked almonds, for dressing the top of the tart']
